title: Owatonna, Minnesota
summary: Owatonna (/ˌoʊwəˈtɒnə/) is a city in Steele County, Minnesota, United States. The population was 25,599 at the 2010 census.[5]  It is the county seat of Steele County.  Owatonna is home to the Steele County Fairgrounds, which hosts the Steele County Free Fair in August.
